rows.label: qst002601_msg003
rows.name:
Hey, have you seen a
turtle-shaped stone? It's
about the size of my hand.

rows.label: qst002601_msg004
rows.name:
I think I dropped it somewhere
when I was playing outside
the city yesterday.

rows.label: qst002601_msg005
rows.name:
I've been looking for it for a
while, but I can't find it...

rows.label: qst002601_msg006
rows.name:
It snowed a lot, so
maybe it got buried.

rows.label: qst002601_msg007
rows.name:
If I don't find it soon, it'll
get covered by more snow and I
won't know where it is...

rows.label: qst002601_msg008
rows.name:
You see, that stone is a good
luck charm my dad gave me to
help me grow up big and healthy.

rows.label: qst002601_msg009
rows.name: My mom said my dad went far away.

rows.label: qst002601_msg010
rows.name:
But I have my turtle charm,
so I'm not lonely at all!

rows.label: qst002601_msg011
rows.name:
I wonder if Mr. Turtle is lonely
all by himself right now. I
have to find him quickly.

rows.label: qst002601_msg013
rows.name:
I'm going to look around here
a little more, so could you
look around Amphoret Pillar?

rows.label: qst002601_msg014
rows.name:
I went over there yesterday,
so it might be there...

rows.label: qst002601_msg101
rows.name:
I'm going to look around
here a little more.

rows.label: qst002601_msg102
rows.name: Could you look around Amphoret Pillar?

rows.label: qst002601_msg103
rows.name:
I went over there yesterday,
so it might be there...
